Text:
FINALLY, A NEW FAIRY TAIL EPISODE AFTER TWO F*UCKING WEEKS!!!!!!  I was almost crazy because of that. I am so excited and happy like happy. XD

Btw, thanks for the episode, HorribleSubs! You are really the best anime uploader on net with the best quality. Thanks, I really appreciate on it and I really hope you will still give us more episodes of this show with that great quality.
